Actions.Text:
#!/bin/bash

# Get all windows in current space
window_list=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --space)

# Find superwhisper window with AXDialog subrole
window_id=$(echo "$window_list" | jq -r '.[] | select(.app=="superwhisper" and .subrole=="AXSystemDialog") | .id')

if [ -n "$window_id" ]; then
    echo "$window_id"
else
    echo "no"
fi

ThenActions.Text:
#!/bin/bash

# Get window IDs from Keyboard Maestro variable
window_ids=($KMVAR_localSwWin)

# Initialize variables
opacities=()
non_full_opacity=""

# Check if we have multiple window IDs
if [ ${#window_ids[@]} -gt 1 ]; then
    # Get opacity for each window
    for id in "${window_ids[@]}"; do
        # Trim any whitespace
        id=$(echo "$id" | xargs)
        current_opacity=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window "$id" | jq '.opacity')
        opacities+=("$current_opacity")
        
        # Check if this opacity is not 1 (full)
        if (( $(echo "$current_opacity < 1" | bc -l) )); then
            non_full_opacity="$current_opacity"
        fi
    done
    
    # If we found a non-full opacity, echo that
    if [ -n "$non_full_opacity" ]; then
        echo "$non_full_opacity"
    else
        # All opacities are the same (full), echo the first one
        echo "${opacities[0]}"
    fi
else
    # Single window ID
    window_id="${window_ids[0]}"
    opacity=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --windows --window "$window_id" | jq '.opacity')
    echo "$opacity"
fi
